news.title: Businesses are finding a workaround for tariffs — and it's entirely legal
news.summary: The "first sale rule" is a concept in U.S. customs law. It allows importers to use the lowest cost of a good to calculate duties.

news.title: Tech conferences are ramping up security to quell employee protests as political tensions rise
news.summary: Conferences last week hosted by Microsoft and Google showed how much tech companies are investing in security. Microsoft, Google hosted security conferences last week.

news.title: ‘Buckle up, this ride’s far from over': Trump’s EU tariffs delay is no guarantee trade tensions won't escalate, market watchers say
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump delayed the roll out of 50% tariffs on the European Union. Investors are being warned to "buckle up" for more volatility.

news.title: It's the last chance for Southwest plane tickets with two free checked bags, as policy ends in days
news.summary: Southwest will start selling basic economy tickets on May 28. The airline will also start charging for checked bags for the first time in its history.

news.title: Chinese tech giants reveal how they're dealing with U.S. chip curbs to stay in the AI race
news.summary: Tencent and Baidu said stockpiling chips, optimizing AI models and using home-grown semiconductors have helped them progress with the tech.

news.title: ‘He’s lied to us all’: My father is leaving my sister, brother and me a $450K lakefront property. We want to cut my brother out.
news.summary: “My brother has lied to all of us, is generally untrustworthy, and does not pay his bills on time,” his sister said.

news.title: Trump said he would delay European Union tariffs until July 9. U.S. stock futures and Europe equities are rallying.
news.summary: President Trump is delaying a 50% tariff jump for the European Union until July. Investors expressed relief that the move was delayed until the end of July.

news.title: China EV-maker BYD has been grabbing market share from Tesla. Its shares are tanking after price cuts.
news.summary: BYD stock tumbled in Hong Kong on Monday after price cuts to several models. BYD stock fell by more than 10 per cent on Monday.

news.title: ‘Is this a good tax strategy or a sham transaction?’ My mother wants to give me her home. I have a plan to avoid taxes.
news.summary: “If my mother gives her personal residence to me, my understanding is that I also get her adjusted cost basis,” she said.

news.title: My husband used my money to renovate his house. Will I now get half of his property in a divorce?
news.summary: “My name is not on the deed to that rental home, but we have been married 15 years,” she says. “My wife and I have been together for 15 years. We have been very happy.”
